full_summary:
=============================

### Information Management Architect (Architecte en gestion de l'Information)

**Notice ID**: `2024-00015`

#### Solicitation Details

* **Publication Date**: June 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 29, 2023, 1:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 10, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

#### Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of Information Management Architect services.

The selected supplier will analyze the CFIA's existing data/information management capabilities and requirements, develop frameworks and detailed statements of requirements, and recommend areas for improved capability and integration. The supplier will also advise on the implementation of Data Management/Information Management rules and standards.

**Eligibility**

This requirement is open to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region, specifically in the Information Management Architect category.

**Indigenous Business Set-Aside**

This procurement is conditionally set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Suppliers must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business as defined under PSIB and that they will comply with all requirements of PSIB.

**Procurement Details**

* **UNSPSC Code**: 80101508 - Business intelligence consulting services
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (Services)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Ron Staigh
* **Email**: [ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ron.staigh@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 558-5937
* **Address**: 59 Camelot Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0Y9, Canada

**Attachments**

* [2024-00015-NPP.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6289/2024-00015-npp.pdf)
* [2024-00015-APM_1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6289/2024-00015-apm_1.pdf)

Note that the text has been rewritten to improve clarity, accuracy,
